document.full_text: ashton gibbs scored 20 of his 26 points after halftime, and pittsburgh kept the top seeds perfect against the 16s in the ncaa tournament.
document.title: southeast: pittsburgh 74, unc-asheville 51: no. 1 pittsburgh breezes through second round
